task.title: Where we are going and how we are getting there
task.shortdesc: This task will tell you where I am going and how I plan on traveling to and from my destination.

taskbody.context:
I am headed home, to Leesburg, VA, and will be driving myself.
How to get home by car:

step.cmd: After your classes are over, take the bus back to your apartment.
Make sure all the lights are turned off and the trash is taken out.
Turn off all the lights and lock the door.
Double check that you have everything you need in the car.
Get on Route 81-North from Blacksburg. Drive for 3 hours.
Take exit 315 for Winchester and Route 7. Drive for another hour.
Take exit right for Warrenton, VA and Route 15-South. Turn right immediately onto Route 15.
Take the first left onto Evergreen Mill Road. My house is on the right in .35 miles.
Go inside and make sure my sister carries all your bags. Also, ask my dad for gas money. Note: He will say no, but it is worth a try.
